Articles.Content:
hi,im sorpenderin

i am new to the KSP forum and just recently got Kerbal space program. i have already made it into a Kerbol orbt (at least i think)

anyway KSP is a great space sim and i am glad the developers put so much work into it

anyway i love KSP and am planning a kerbol escape. thanks for reading and please reply

(INB4 SKUNKY)

Welcome to the forums! I hope you enjoy your stay! Your next objective should be orbiting Kerbin, and then going for the Mun.
